channel.name: CRIS_OMG-ORU_Q
channel.description:
Publishing channel for CRIS RIS ORM & ORU messages. Uses Q #
--== HISTORY ==-- $Id: CRIS_OMG-ORU_Q.xml 323 2012-11-15 08:54:32Z MarkD $ $Rev: 323 $ 04-10-11 MRD Cloned from CRIS_OMG-ORU_Q MRD Added filter for NOC ORU messages only 18-10-11 MRD Put source of messages (ORH, NOC) into OBR 19 so subscriber channel can see it. 26-OCT HS Modified getPromotedData() call in enqueueing JS Destination to use a channel specific Promoter 11-NOV HS Added code to perform advanced publishing/subscription 23/11/11 MRD Amended PID 3 transformation to correctly remove non NOC MRS's 05-12-11 MRD Modified OMG PID3 processing to accomadate RIS behavior 20/12/11 MRD Modified so does not store filtered message data **** PLEASE CHECK SOURCE/DESTINATION CONNECTION DETAILS WHEN MIGRATING CHANNEL TO NEW ENVIRONMENT ****

step.name: messageControlID
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.10']['MSH.10.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('messageControlID', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: julianDateNow
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = DateUtil.getCurrentDate("yyyyDDD");; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('julianDateNow', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: julianDateTimeNow
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = DateUtil.getCurrentDate("DDDHHmmssSSS");; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('julianDateTimeNow', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: event
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.9']['MSH.9.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('event', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: CreateACK
PID3
Mark OBR with org message source
Put message XML in channelMap

rule.name: Filter for just OMG and ORG messages

step.name: PID3
Put message XML in channelMap

rule.name: Filter ORU messages from NOC

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
